summary: A memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York dated August 12, 2019, documenting information passed from the Special Housing Unit on August 9, 2019, regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein needing a cellmate upon return from an attorney visit, and referencing a daily assignment roster for that date.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, referenced by his inmate number #76318-054, noted as needing a cellmate upon return from an attorney visit.

persons.name: Officer
persons.context: Mentioned as part of the shift staff receiving information about inmate Epstein.

persons.name: S/O/SMIE
persons.context: Staff member who passed information from the Special Housing Unit regarding inmate Epstein.

persons.name: Inmate MEM
persons.context: Another inmate mentioned as going to WAB (possibly Work Assignment Board) and possibly not returning, relevant to cell assignment logistics.

connections.description: Both are correctional staff members involved in passing and receiving information about inmate assignments.
S/O/SMIE passed information regarding Epstein's need for a cellmate after an attorney visit.

events.title: Information Passed on Epstein's Cell Assignment
events.description: At approximately 1:50 PM, information was passed from the Special Housing Unit that inmate Jeffrey Epstein would need a cellmate upon his return from an attorney visit.

events.title: Daily Assignment Roster Posted
events.description: A daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center was posted, detailing staff shifts and assignments for August 9, 2019.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
keyFacts: The document is a memorandum dated August 12, 2019, referencing events from August 9, 2019, just days before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
It notes that inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was expected to need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit on August 9, 2019.
The document includes a daily assignment roster for August 9, 2019, showing staff shifts and assignments at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
Information was passed from the Special Housing Unit (SHU) regarding inmate movements and cell assignments.
